item.description:
Hello Canucks,

For the first meetup of the year we'll be going skating in Cambridge and then heading out afterwards for dinner and/or drinks at a local bar. There is a nice a outdoor skating rink at Kendall Square. I was thinking of either the CBC (not the Canadian Broadcasting Company) or Lord Hobo. Both are within walking distance of the ice rink at Kendall Square.

Kendall Square Ice Skating

Please make sure you RSVP so we know how many people will be joining us.

Hope you can make it!

Andrew
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet inside the skate rental shop

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Expat Canadian January Meetup
